author: Arizona Geological Survey

resources.description: Provides map and text-based search of ~39000 files and datasets. Cataloged web services provide access to more than 7 Million individual data records. Information compiled by US State and Federal Geological Surveys, Southern Methodist University, the Geothermal Resource Council, USDOE Geothermal Data Repository, Stanford University Geothermal Program, and Univesity of Utah Energy and Geoscience Institute (EGI).
resources.name: NGDS Portal Web site

organization.description: USGIN is a federated information-sharing framework that uses free and open-source technology, capable of interacting with similarly configured data-sharing networks. This approach offers a long-term solution to data storage and sharing without any proprietary software.
organization.title: USGIN
organization.name: usgin

name: ngds-geothermal-data-catalog
notes: The National Geothermal Data System (NGDS) is a catalog of documents and datasets that provide information about geothermal resources.
title: NGDS Geothermal Data Catalog
